action.description: Action for the RBAC policy ("access_as_external" or "access_as_shared") (choices: access_as_external, access_as_shared)

format.description: the output format, defaults to table (choices: json, shell, table, value, yaml)

noindent.description: whether to disable indenting the JSON

project_domain.description: Domain the project belongs to (name or ID). This can be used in case collisions between project names exist.

project_id.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by id

project_name.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by name

rbac_object.description: The object to which this RBAC policy affects (name or ID)

target_project.description: The project to which the RBAC policy will be enforced (name or ID)

target_project_domain.description: Domain the target project belongs to (name or ID). This can be used in case collisions between project names exist.

type.description: Type of the object that RBAC policy affects ("qos_policy" or "network") (choices: qos_policy, network)
